A Digital Repository of Explorations and Creations

Welcome to the online home of J.G. Landje. This website serves as a personal archive and public-facing collection of my diverse intellectual and creative endeavors. Here, you will find a variety of content reflecting my interests in literature, philosophy, software development, culinary arts, and esoteric studies.

Featured Sections:

  • Essays: Delve into my thoughts and reflections on a range of subjects. This section contains my written explorations of various ideas and concepts.

  • Epubs: Discover a collection of digital publications I have prepared, including Richard Wilhelmâ€™s German translations of the Daodejing and the Zhuangzi, as well as previously unavailable EPUB versions of works by Aleister Crowley.

  • Recipes: Explore my culinary adventures and find inspiration for your own kitchen with a collection of recipes I enjoy.

  • Coding Projects: Examine my personal software development projects, featuring applications such as a CLI game launcher, an I Ching web app, and various game clones.

About Me:

To learn more about my background, interests, and motivations, please visit the About Me page.

Contact:

If you wish to get in touch, please find my contact information on the Contact page.

Thank you for visiting. I invite you to explore the various sections of this website and engage with the content provided.
